title: Lord of the Flies
creator_credit: Peter Brook, Lewis M. Allen, Two Arts and Allen-Hogdon Productions
brief_description: A group of schoolboys crash on a remote tropical island and revert to the laws of the jungle to survive. However, when savage emotions split them into two warring tribes, hate turns to bloodlust, culminating in a shocking murder. A frightening adaptation of Nobel Prizewinner, William Golding’s novel.
